modName: Sword of Ancient Tongues Royal Retexture
summary: A simple re-texture of Corvalho1's amazing "Sword of Ancient Tongues".
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]This mod adds more of a royal themed colour to the sword as well as upscaling it the sword itself to a 4094px texture. So if you have a lower end PC just be aware. If the mod gets more popularity I will add 2048px and 1024px sizes for those with lower graphics cards.[/b][/center]
All credit goes to Corvalho1 for his mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52700/?

[center] [img]http://s29.postimg.org/qxd49dx9z/Sword.png[/img]﻿﻿[/center]
author: Carter641
